channel.title: Small bug with residence plugin
channel.description: Paintings on your wall are unprotected in your residence. I had a friend test it by breaking my paintings, and it worked fine for them, and bb log doesn't even pick it up. Please fix this.

item.title: Small bug with residence plugin
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Nokturth, post:11, topic:407306”]with building and container they can.
i was looking for milk near a res i couldn’t get any milk from the cow there, it’s nonsence, how could milk hurt anyone? xD[/quote]
It stops people flooding lava and water in your res by preventing use of a bucket. Anyway, the map is big enough to go find your own cows

Read full topic

item.title: Small bug with residence plugin
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:9, topic:407306”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=508591.msg3694575#msg3694575 date=1312342427]

another bug: if you want to get milk from a cow in someone’s residence, it says you don’t have permission to do it.

Did you give them the bucket permission?
[/quote]HAAHAHAHA!

There’s a bucket flag. It wasn’t really a joke.

im laughing at the joke XD why is there a bucket flag haha[/quote]
It’s not even a joke so I don’t know why you’re smiling. Bucket flag for lava/water floods

Read full topic

item.title: Small bug with residence plugin
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

If neither residence nor big brother does anything with paintings, I’d say the problem is more likely bukkit itself not tracking them. Still, you should post this in the residence and big brother threads and let me know what they say.

Read full topic

item.title: Small bug with residence plugin
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Paintings on your wall are unprotected in your residence. I had a friend test it by breaking my paintings, and it worked fine for them, and bb log doesn’t even pick it up. Please fix this.

Read full topic
